) D ORDER BY D.GRP_IDX DESC, D.GRP_ORDER ASC ) DD ORDER BY NUM DESC limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT FROM TB_BOARD

SELECT B_IDX, B_CODE, B_CATE, TITLE, CONTENT, FILECLASS, URL, HIT, SECRET_YN, GRP_IDX, GRP_ORDER, GRP_LAYER, PW, NOTICE_YN, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_NAME, REG_DATE FROM TB_BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND B_IDX = #{bIdx}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET B_CATE = #{bCate}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, FILECLASS = #{fileclass}, NOTICE_YN = #{noticeYn}, URL = #{url}, MOD_ID = #{session.id}, MOD_NAME = #{session.name}, MOD_DATE = now(), MOD_IP = #{remoteAddr} WHERE B_IDX = #{bIdx}
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET HIT = HIT + 1, MOD_ID = #{session.id}, MOD_NAME = #{session.name}, MOD_DATE = now(), MOD_IP = #{remoteAddr} WHERE B_IDX = #{bIdx}
